songs.title: And Then We Kiss (Junkie XL Remix)
songs.album: B in the Mix: The Remixes
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Lying alone, touching my skin
I'm falling under
A girl like me
And I can't hold it in
It makes me wonder
Is this for real?
It's not what it seems
You're like an angel
I'm running now
My feet off the ground

[Pre-Chorus]
Take me, touch me
Won't you hold me close?

[Chorus]
And then we kiss
Your love comes alive on my lips
I feel a rush
Coming over me, over me
And when we touch
This moment when everything's still
I close my eyes and then we kiss

[Verse 2]
The feel of your hand
As it touches my hair
It makes me tremble
Don't wanna let go
Of the feelings we share
So baby, go slow
Our hearts beating fast
And my body cries
I want it to last
It's burning inside
We're getting deeper

[Pre-Chorus]
Take me, touch me
Won't you hold me close?

[Chorus 2]
You're drifting
The sun comes up
You're fading
You seem so far
I don't know if I'm awake
Open my eyes and then we kiss

[Pre-Chorus]
Take me, touch me
Won't you hold me close?

[Chorus]
And then we kiss
And then we kiss
And when we touch
This moment when everything's still
I close my eyes and then we kiss
